headline: Equifax : October 2024 U.S. National Consumer Credit Trends Report
summary: AS OF OCTOBER 2024, TOTAL U.S. CONSUMER DEBT was $17.58 trillion, up 2.6% over a year ago. Mortgage debt, including home equity loans, accounted for $12.94 trillion, a 73.6% share of total debt, while...
